name: La Invicta - Nicaragua - Shorts
additionalNotes: The Invicta is a brand of cigars with a long tradition, born in the 1940s in response to the difficulties of the Second World War. Originally made with Jamaican tobacco, today they offer two lines: the Honduran, softer, and the Nicaraguan, more robust. All La Invicta cigars are handmade from long-filled tobacco leaves and designed to suit the tastes of British smokers. Its name, "La Invicta," reflects the strength and resilience of a brand that has stood the test of time.
